Coronation Street: The Mystery Of The Missing Hotpot Recipe

name: Coronation Street: The Mystery Of The Missing Hotpot Recipe
summary: Betty decides that she should get rid of her secret hot pot recipe so it doesn't get into the wrong hands. Just as she is about to throw away the ripped up pieces of paper a gust of wind blows them away!
